titles.title: Waiving points of order against the further conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1977) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-403, by Ms. Pryce.
Rule provides for consideration of the further conference report to H.R. 1977.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 149.

action.text: Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 297.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 188 (Roll no. 852).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/13/1995--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the further conference report on H.R. 1977 (Department of the Interior and related agencies appropriations).
